name: FRigUnit_GetTransformArray
doc: GetTransformArray is used to retrieve an array of transforms from the hierarchy.

Items: The items to retrieve the transforms for
Space: Defines if the transforms should be retrieved in local or global space
bInitial:
Defines if the transforms should be retrieved as current (false) or initial (true).
Initial transforms for bones and other elements in the hierarchy represent the reference pose's value.
Transforms: The current transform of the given item - or identity in case it wasn't found.
